com.sun.faces.annotation

Annotation Type Tag


  • @Retention(value=SOURCE)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Tag
    Annotation that identifies a class as being the JSP tag class for a component.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String componentType
      The type of the component to which this tag corresponds.

    • Element Detail

      • componentType

        public abstract java.lang.String componentType
        The type of the component to which this tag corresponds. The value must correspond to the Component.type() value of a component class in the current compilation unit.
